item.title: CentOS/RHEL 7
item.description: So after many years the following changes I’ve so far run into with CentOS 7 firewalld # firewall-cmd --zone=public --add-service=https success # firewall-cmd --zone=public --add-service=http success # firewall-cmd --zone=public --list-all public (default, active) interfaces: eth0 eth1 sources: services: dhcpv6-client http https ssh ports: masquerade: no forward-ports: icmp-blocks: rich rules: systemd # systemd enable nginx # ln -s '/usr/lib/systemd/system/nginx.service' '/etc/systemd/system/multi-user.target.wants/nginx.service' $ systemctl status nginx nginx.service - nginx - high performance web server Loaded: loaded (/usr/lib/systemd/system/nginx.
